days.title: Day 1 Prayer
days.text:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

Lord Jesus, your faithful servant St Marianne Cope lovingly served the outcasts of the world, especially those afflicted with leprosy.  Through her heroic example and powerful intercession before your throne in Heaven, I ask for the grace of (mention request here…)  Help me to imitate her generosity and self-sacrifice, offering my sufferings in union with yours and seeking to help those whom the world has shunned.  St Marianne Cope, pray for us.

Concluding Prayer

Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be
